name: feedforward
description: ## **ðŸš€ Project Overview**   **FeedForward** is a digital platform designed to **connect surplus food sources** (restaurants, hotels, caterers) with **NGOs** and community organizations in real-time. Our goal is to **minimize food waste** while ensuring that surplus food reaches those in need.

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:web && npm run install:server
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd web && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
